title: jerry0
author: jerry0
content: Haven't updated ledger live in months.  Am still using ledger live 2.57.0.  The current ledger live is 2.66.Do I just update it from ledger live in the top right and it should update it without any issue?  Or because it's a much older version of ledger live, there would be issues and I have to download it directly from ledger site?  I remember a long time ago, there was an instance where if your ledger live was older than so and so version... you had to download ledger live manually from ledger website because it wouldn't download the update correctly from ledger live.  Also is there anything you need to do during the update because I recall there was that service ledger introduced which most people did not want to do.Am using a nano ledger s plus.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: This is the lastest Ledger Live update and how you can update it: https://support.ledger.com/hc/en-us/articles/360020773319-What-s-new-in-Ledger-Live-?docs=trueLedger Nano are not recommendable wallets, it would be good to buy Passport (bitcoin only) or Trezor (altcoins included) instead.I hope you know about their update on how people using Ledger hardware wallet can backup their seed phrase with third parties. Not only that, the company does not care about their user's privacy and the hardware wallet part is close source.

comments.author: jerry0
comments.body: Is there any issue updating ledger live from all the way old version 2.57 to 2.66 though?  I haven't updated it in months so it is an older version.  The reason for that was because of those ledger news so I didn't bother.Well isn't the ledger recovery only for nano ledger x (optional)?  I have the nano ledger s plus.Didn't they change their policy with the ledger recovery though?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: jerry0 on August 29, 2023, 07:30:54 AM~snip~Why not try to update it to the latest version?Don't worry about updating it to the latest version because you can later downgrade it back to the 2.57 version if anything goes wrong or have some issues after updating it to the latest version.Here's the guide on how to downgrade the ledger live below- https://support.ledger.com/hc/en-us/articles/7446430773149-Downgrading-to-an-older-version-of-Ledger-Live?support=trueAll old versions can be downloaded here https://www.ledger.com/ledger-live/lld-signatures
